text: Photo : Netflix Yes, there are spoilers below about Stranger Things and Stranger Things 2. If you haven ’ t watched yet and want to remain spoiler - free, please keep that in mind. Stranger Things was an instant sensation when it debuted on Netflix last year. Its potent blend of frights, ’ 80s nostalgia, and the revival of Winona Ryder ’ s career made it a hit with fans and critics alike. But there was one thing that Stranger Things fans loved above all else : Barb. In season one, Barbara Holland was Nancy Wheeler ’ s best friend, the nerdy high - schooler clad in Sally Jesse Raphael ’ s glasses and a puffy, ridiculously cerulean parka. Barb was quiet but loyal, awkward but fabulous, forgotten by Hawkins, Indiana
